Classes in edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.controller used by edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.controller
DefaultModelValues
          Initializes and manages the default values.
InputListener
          The interface InputListener defines functions for reacting to events caused by user input by changing the model accordingly and thus ensuring that the view receives all information necessary.
InputListenerAdapter.CategoryEntry
          Stores a category and a boolean indicating if the category is currently active or not.
MapListener
          Classes that implement this interface are used to react to certain events on the map by changing the model accordingly and updating the view if necessary.
POIListener
          Classes that implement this interfaces are used to react to events that originate from POIs by changing the model accordingly and updating the view if necessary.
